entry.title: Python Web Templating Battle
entry.summary:
Summary

Head to head - popular templating engines using in the Python world will be compared and contrasted. Increasingly, frameworks allow many different choices in templating engines. In this talk I’ll discuss the different approaches, demo and pros and cons to help you decide if there is a better templating …
entry.content:
Summary

Head to head - popular templating engines using in the Python world will be compared and contrasted. Increasingly, frameworks allow many different choices in templating engines. In this talk I’ll discuss the different approaches, demo and pros and cons to help you decide if there is a better templating engine for you.
